page.title: 08Communication in Barkestone
page.content: There are some local papers.The Melton Times,The Grantham Journal,The Newark Advertiser and the Belvoir country news and the Nottingham Evening Post. They all come at regular intervals. There are other forms of communication like telephones which most people have.Some people have C,B radios instead,which are radios that you use to speak to other private radio users in their cars or lorrys.There are quite a lot of radio stations round here.Most people have a T,V.For Plungar Barkestone and Redmile there is a post lady.You can post letters at the post office.There is a sub post office at Plungar and Redmile Barkestone had one until a year ago.You can also send a telegram to someone.You can use a computer for sending messages.
